title: General
stimulusHtml:
1 point maximum

1 point: they say (that)/claim (that)/consider (that)/relate (that)/allege (that)/tell (that)/refer to/name/call/regard (OR other present tense translations of verbs of saying, thinking, and believing)
descriptions:
Student response earns none of the available points.

1 point maximum

1 point: they say (that)/claim (that)/consider (that)/relate (that)/allege (that)/tell (that)/refer to/name/call/regard (OR other present tense translations of verbs of saying, thinking, and believing)

Student response earns one of the available points.
